title: Moving Average Filter
description: This function block implements a moving average filter that computes the average of the last N values. It initializes a buffer to store these values and updates the average based on the incoming data X. The output Y represents the current value of the moving average.
name: FILTER_MAV_DW

input.name: X
input.description: The input data value to be filtered.

input.name: N
input.description: The number of samples to consider for the moving average. It is limited to a maximum of 32.

input.name: RST
input.description: A reset signal that, when TRUE, reinitializes the buffer and the output.

output.name: Y
output.description: The output value representing the current moving average.
